title: Copper Systems
description: High-performance copper cabling solutions for reliable data transmission in enterprise and data center environments.
features: Superior signal integrity and transmission performance
detailedDescription: Our copper cabling systems provide robust, reliable connectivity solutions for modern network infrastructure. From Category 6 to Category 6A, our copper cables are designed to meet the most demanding requirements of today's enterprise and data center environments.

title: Bulk Copper Cable
description: High-quality bulk copper cabling options for enterprise and data center applications.
features: Various jacket colors for easy identification
detailedDescription: Our bulk copper cable solutions offer exceptional performance for demanding network applications. Available in various configurations, these cables feature innovative designs that minimize crosstalk and interference while providing reliable high-speed connections for your infrastructure.

specifications.Jacket Colors: Blue, White, Yellow, Green, Black, Red, Orange, Violet

title: TX6A™ Category 6A UTP Copper Cable
description: High-performance Category 6A UTP copper cable with innovative Vari-MaTriX Technology for superior alien crosstalk suppression.
features: Innovative Vari-MaTriX technology for alien crosstalk mitigation
Superior PoE performance for high-power devices
Improved cable fill and simplified installation
Available in plenum (CMP) and riser (CMR) ratings
Multiple color options for organizational flexibility
detailedDescription: The TX6A™ Category 6A UTP Copper Cable with Vari-MaTriX Technology represents our premium copper cabling solution. Designed for mission-critical applications, this cable provides exceptional alien crosstalk suppression while maintaining a smaller diameter for improved pathway fill and easier installation. Perfect for high-bandwidth applications and Power over Ethernet (PoE) installations.

specifications.Available Colors: Blue, Red, White, Yellow, Green, Orange, Violet

title: TX6™ Category 6 UTP Copper Cable
description: Reliable Category 6 UTP cabling solution for standard enterprise network applications.
features: Multiple jacket colors for easy identification
Available in plenum and riser ratings
detailedDescription: Our TX6™ Category 6 UTP Copper Cable provides reliable performance for standard enterprise network applications. Designed to exceed industry standards, this cable delivers consistent transmission characteristics across all pairs, ensuring reliable performance for your critical network infrastructure.

specifications.Available Colors: Blue, White, Black, Yellow, Green, Red, Gray

title: Patch Cords
description: High-quality patch cables for reliable connectivity between network devices.
features: Available in Category 5e, 6, and 6A performance levels
detailedDescription: Our patch cords provide reliable connectivity between network equipment. Available in various performance levels, lengths, and colors, these cables are designed for durability and consistent performance in any network environment. Each patch cord is 100% tested at the factory to ensure compliance with industry standards.
